titles.title: For the relief of Augusto Ernesto Segovia, Maria Isabel Segovia, Edelmira Isabel Segovia, Perla Franccesca Segovia, and Augusto Thomas Segovia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/2/1999--Introduced. Declares five named individuals to be eligible for issuance of immigrant visas or for adjustment of status to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
